mapper.delete: delete from cs_info_access where info_id in (${info_id})
mapper.select:
select i.lasttime, i.cat_id, g.cat_cname from (select cat_id,max(released_dtime) lasttime from cs_info where 1=1
and info_status = #{info_status}
and cat_id in (${cat_ids})
group by cat_id order by lasttime desc ) i, cs_info_category g where i.cat_id = g.cat_id
and g.cat_position like '%#{group_id}%'
